rows.label: qev055401_MSG0001
rows.name: Might you be the one who assisted Kun'luarb?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0002
rows.name: Before departing, he left me a message.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0003
rows.name:
He said that if something were to happen to him and
we were unable to find a source of senirapa water,
I should come to you for help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev055401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask if Kun'luarb is back yet.

rows.label: qev055401_JNK0020
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev055401_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Kon'luarb that he can ask you anything.

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0004
rows.name:
He is not. And as Noctilum is a terrible place full of
vicious primordial creatures, I fear something may have
happened to him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0005
rows.name:
Which brings me to my request: I would ask you to go
to Noctilum and search for Kun'luarb.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0006
rows.name:
You appear to be precisely as he described you—
straightforward and dependable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0007
rows.name:
Which brings me to my request: I would ask you to go
to Noctilum and search for Kun'luarb.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0008
rows.name:
When you find him, inform him that we have
completed development on a new technology.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0009
rows.name:
We are now able to use the extremely pure water
of Biahno Lake to synthesize senirapa water,
so long as we have a source sample.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0010
rows.name:
If he is able to locate even a small amount,
we will again have the means to multiply and survive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0011
rows.name: I hope that will ease the burden of his search a bit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0012
rows.name:
The water he brings home will be the key to the future
of us Orpheans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0013
rows.name: Please find him, whatever it takes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0014
rows.name:
The senirapa-water replication method I developed is
only theoretical at this point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0015
rows.name:
The chances of success are 99.95 percent given a
parent sample, but I am still eager to test it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0016
rows.name: I ask that you find Kun'luarb as soon as you are able.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0017
rows.name:
Ah, the BLADE. They told me what happened.
Please bring us senirapa water.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0018
rows.name:
However small the amount, I promise to grow it into
a supply which can ensure the prosperity of us Orphe
on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0019
rows.name:
This was Kun'luarb's fervent wish, and a matter that will
decide the fate of my race. Please bring such a sample
back without fail.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0020
rows.name:
Whenever I speak with Sin'luarb and Sen'luarb,
I feel Kun'luarb's Ovah flowing strong within them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0021
rows.name:
His death represents a huge loss to the Orphe,
yet I am glad he was able to divide in the end.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0022
rows.name:
We must obtain a sample of senirapa water so that
more of my kind may enjoy the same happiness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0023
rows.name: Has there been any progress in your search?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0024
rows.name:
...Ah! This is senirapa water, without a doubt.
Now I should be able to manufacture sufficient water
for all the Orphe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0025
rows.name:
In time, this city will be rife with my kind.
Do you suppose humans will welcome this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev055401_SEL0031
rows.name: Smile and say that you're sure of it.

rows.label: qev055401_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev055401_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that some people will certainly be unsettled.

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0026
rows.name:
You humans are a generous and open race.
I will trust in that as I endeavor to create vast numbers
of Orphe within the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0027
rows.name:
I see. And since the plants we require to sustain us are
also limited in quantity, I will keep our numbers to a
sustainable, nonthreatening level.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0028
rows.name:
Thank you for your help. We Orphe will now embark
on the next phase of our life on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0029
rows.name:
Know that our new brothers yet to be born will inherit
a sense of deep gratitude for all you have done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0030
rows.name: Ah, you are back safely. And did you find Kun'luarb?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0031
rows.name:
...What? Killed by primordial creatures? And he left a
single drop of senirapa water in your care?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0032
rows.name:
I see... Despite securing new senirapa water,
this is a terrible loss for my kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0033
rows.name:
I must set to work multiplying our numbers so as to
fill the void he left behind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0034
rows.name:
Please entrust the water to me—I will begin replicating
it at once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0035
rows.name:
This is indeed senirapa water.
It is a wonder Kun'luarb managed to find it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0036
rows.name:
Now Orphe will fill this city, just as he had hoped.
But will you humans welcome this, I wonder?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_JNK0050
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev055401_SEL0051
rows.name: Smile and say that you're sure of it.

rows.label: qev055401_JNK0060
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev055401_SEL0061
rows.name: Say that some people will be unsettled.

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0037
rows.name:
You humans are a generous and open race.
I will trust in that as I endeavor to create vast numbers
of Orphe within the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0038
rows.name:
I see. And since the plants we require to sustain us are
also limited in quantity, I will keep our numbers to a
sustainable, nonthreatening level.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0039
rows.name:
Thank you for your help. We Orphe will now embark
on the next phase of our life on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055401_MSG0040
rows.name:
Know that our new brothers yet to be born will inherit
a sense of deep gratitude for all you have done.[ST:wait ]
